name: scope
description: A JS based, hardware-accelerated oscilloscope supporting network, audio and generic sources and sinks
author: Noah Huesser <yatekii@yatekii.ch>

scripts.build: rm -rf build/js && mkdir build/js && cp src/index.html build/index.html && DEPS=1 rollup -c ./scripts/rollup.umd.js && DEPS=1 rollup -c ./scripts/rollup.es.js -o build/build.log
scripts.watch: cp src/index.html build/index.html && DEPS=1 PORT=8080 WATCH_DIR=./build/ rollup -c ./scripts/rollup.watch.js  -o build/build.log --watch
